actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Information, Justice and Agriculture.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Information, Justice, and Agriculture

official_title: To provide equal access to Presidential, congressional, and judicial records.
short_title: Equal Access to Presidential, Congressional, and Judicial Records Act

summary.text: Equal Access to Presidential, Congressional, and Judicial Records Act - Amends the Freedom of Information Act to redefine agencies subject to such Act to include the legislative branch, the offices of President and Vice President, and the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.

titles.title: Equal Access to Presidential, Congressional, and Judicial Records Act
To provide equal access to Presidential, congressional, and judicial records.
